short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds contextual menu item to WordPress Plugin Directory to allow access to checking plugins through the Plugin Security Checker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides quick access to checking WordPress plugins for possible security issues using the Plugin Security Checker, through a contextual menu item on Plugin Directory pages.
